description: Time-based animated eye effects. Frontend runs a 30fps setInterval loop that sends EYE_ commands with values computed from math functions. Same architecture as animated post processing on the Directors Cut page, animated makeup, and animated hair.

mechanism.toggle: Click to start, click again to stop. Only one animation active at a time.
mechanism.persistence: Animation survives page navigation via module-level refs

animations.name: Dilate
animations.description: Pupil scale oscillates between constricted and dilated, simulating light adaptation
animations.update: sin(t * PI / 2) drives PupilScale between 0.70 (constricted) and 1.30 (dilated)

animations.name: Hypnotic
animations.description: Iris color UV coordinates slowly rotate through the color lookup texture
animations.update: sin/cos waves drive IrisColor1U/V and IrisColor2U/V in circular paths through the UV space, creating a smooth color shift

animations.name: Glint
animations.description: Iris brightness and specularity pulse for a sparkling, alive look
animations.update: sin(t * PI) drives IrisBrightness 0.80-1.40, IrisSpecularity 0.30-0.70, ScleraSpecularity 0.30-0.60

animations.name: Blood Flow
animations.description: Vein power and sclera tint fluctuate to simulate pulsing blood vessels
animations.update: sin(t * PI / 2.5) drives VeinsPower 0.20-0.85, ScleraTintU/V shift 0.18-0.35 for reddening effect

animations.name: Morph
animations.description: Iris distortion parameters oscillate for a warping, otherworldly effect
animations.update: sin/cos waves drive DistortStrength 0.00-0.30, DistortScale 3.0-7.0, Pan X/Y drift in circular pattern

animations.name: Stare
animations.description: Slow pupil dilation with increasing sclera darkness for an intense, unsettling gaze
animations.update: Ramp up PupilScale 1.0-1.40, ScleraCornerDarkRadius 0.5-0.85, then snap back. IrisBrightness dims 1.0-0.7 during ramp
